title: Sri Lanka thrash Bangladesh in second Test, win series
body_lines: Oshada Fernando hit an unbeaten 21 to give Sri Lanka a storming 10-wicket victory against Bangladesh in the second Test and a 1-0 series win on Friday.
The visitors earlier bowled out Bangladesh for 169 runs in the second innings at Dhaka after Asitha Fernando finished with a career-best 6-51.
